spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly accurate with adjacency maintained. Minor issues with wall thickness scaling and small window shifts compared to the blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural adherence: no text/labels, floating model on dark background, and 100% room count matched with no hallucinations.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture. The kitchen island and dining table match positions well, though some small side tables are slightly oversized relative to the blueprint's floor area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong low-poly aesthetic with flat shading. Minimal textures. The camera angle is correct for isometric orthographic visualization.

detected_errors.description: Minor dimensional scaling distortion on the bottom balcony width compared to the main footprint.
